AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: child prisoner
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was born on a certain day, to uncertain parents. As a prisoner [PAWN_pronoun] was taken to an unknown land, for an unknown purpose.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: street kid
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] spent most of [PAWN_possessive] early life living on the streets. [PAWN_pronoun] quickly fell in with the wrong crowd, and wound up making some regrettable decisions.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: child thief
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] quickly learnt [PAWN_pronoun] had a knack for obtaining other peoples posessions, not legitimately of course. One fateful day [PAWN_pronoun] was so very close to being caught, and since then [PAWN_nameDef] decided [PAWN_pronoun] wouldn't take any more chances.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: raised by nords
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription:
[PAWN_nameDef] spent [PAWN_possessive] early years in a nice little village in the Velothi mountains. Alas, that life came to an end one fateful day, when savage Nords attacked [PAWN_possessive] village. No one knows why, but [PAWN_nameDef] was taken from [PAWN_possessive] family by the invaders, and bought to Skyrim.

[PAWN_nameDef] started a new life there, and was taught many things by [PAWN_possessive] new family. Admittedly these things were mostly focused on how to best punch stuff, but [PAWN_nameDef] also picked up a dislike for wearing clothes.

Over time, [PAWN_nameDef] has become increasingly aware that [PAWN_pronoun] may in fact not actually be a Nord.
